title: display status in teams index
body_html:
Shows the same status icons as in the supervisor dashboard to admins in the /teams view.
The change is simple enough but is there any convention where to put shared partials?
Since they are used in another view now supervisor/dashboard/ seems like an odd location for the performance indicating partials.
body_text:
Shows the same status icons as in the supervisor dashboard to admins in the /teams view.
The change is simple enough but is there any convention where to put shared partials?
Since they are used in another view now supervisor/dashboard/ seems like an odd location for the performance indicating partials.
body:
Shows the same status icons as in the supervisor dashboard to admins in the /teams view.
The change is simple enough but is there any convention where to put shared partials?
Since they are used in another view now `supervisor/dashboard/` seems like an odd location for the performance indicating partials.
